title: Surface Browser
queue_description: Queue up a seed web link (any internet address with images) or a seed search word. Surface Browser will use these seeds as starting points to traverse the internet.
background_text: Refer to {joystick_link}joystick instructions{/link}, {info_link}background{/link} and {cat_link}catalogue essay{/link} (from NESTA, UK) for more information.
sphere_instructions: fire: choose selected link (images with links appear highlighted with tunnel)
button 1/2: zoom up to/away from surface
installation_note: The work can be installed on home computers from www.boxc.net
db_error: An error occurred while retrieving links. Please try again later.
